blacklist.name: blacklist
blacklist.description: Allows you to black certain words from being sent in your server.
blacklist.usage: <prefix>blacklist <word1 word2 word3 etc...> (It will ask you if you want to warn users or just delete)

serverstats.name: serverstats
serverstats.description: Adds private voice channels under a "Server Stats" category showing member count, channel count, role count, and bot count.

setadminroles.name: setadminroles
setadminroles.description: Allows server owner to set which roles they want to be able to use the admin commands.

setapprovalchannel.name: setapprovalchannel
setapprovalchannel.description: Sets channel where approved suggestions will go.

setsuggestchannel.name: setsuggestchannel
setsuggestchannel.description: Sets channel where your users can send suggestions with the suggest command.

setlogschannel.name: setlogschannel
setlogschannel.description: Sets channel where the bot's logs will go to.

setmemberrole.name: setmemberrole
setmemberrole.description: Sets the base member role that will be given to new members OR verified members.

setmuterole.name: setmuterole
setmuterole.description: Sets the role to give members when the mute command is ran.

setprefix.name: setprefix
setprefix.description: Sets the prefix used to invoke this bot's commands for your server

setticketcategory.name: setticketcategory
setticketcategory.description: Sets the category where user created tickets will go, required for tickets command.

welcome.name: welcome
welcome.description: Sets welcome channel for welcome cards

antiad.name: antiad
antiad.description: Allows for you to choose whether or not Discord server invitations are able to be sent in your server.

ban.name: ban
ban.description: Permanantly bans targeted user from you server.

giverole.name: giverole
giverole.description: Gives a targeted user a role

kick.name: kick
kick.description: Kicks a user from your server

mute.name: mute
mute.description: Mutes a targeted member for your specified amount of time (Requires mute role setup)
mute.usage: <prefix>mute <@target [number of minutes OR nothing for indefinite mute]>

removerole.name: removerole
removerole.description: Removes a role form a user.

warn.name: warn
warn.description: Gives a user a warning for your provided reason and stores it.

warnlist.name: warnlist
warnlist.description: Shows the amount of warnings a specified user has.

checklist.name: checklist
checklist.description: Shows what customization options you have configured.

announce.name: announce
announce.description: Anncounces a message in an embed to your selected channel.

channelcreate.name: channelcreate
channelcreate.description: Creates a channel in your server

createrole.name: createrole
createrole.description: Creates a role in your server

deletechannel.name: deletechannel
deletechannel.description: Deletes a targeted channel in your server

deleterole.name: deleterole
deleterole.description: Deletes a targeted role in your server

leaderboard.name: leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Shows the amount of invites each user has with a maximum of 25 users.

nuke.name: nuke
nuke.description: Deletes and copies a targeted text channel or the channel command is ran in.

purge.name: purge
purge.description: Deletes up to 100 messages less than 2 weeks old in the channel command is ran in

av.name: av
av.description: Sends an image of the avatar for the specified user

roll.name: roll
roll.description: Rolls a specified dice and modifier

magic8.name: magic8
magic8.description: Ask a question to the magic 8-ball

tempconvert.name: tempconvert
tempconvert.description: Convert a temperature to Farenheit, Celsius, or Kelvin

hentai.name: hentai
hentai.description: Sends an image from r/hentai (can only be sent in NSFW channels)

reddit.name: reddit
reddit.description: Choose a subreddit to send an image from

csgo.name: csgo
csgo.description: Sends Steam market pricing for the specified CSGO item.

dota.name: dota
dota.description: Sends Steam market pricing for the specified Dota2 item.

tf2.name: tf2
tf2.description: Sends Steam market pricing for the specified TF2 item.

rust.name: rust
rust.description: Sends Steam market pricing for the specified Rust item.

play.name: play
play.description: Searches YouTube for the specified request and will play it in the voice channel you are in.

nowplaying.name: nowplaying
nowplaying.description: Shows the current song in the queue.

skip.name: skip
skip.description: Skips the current song in the queue.

stop.name: stop
stop.description: Disconnects the bot from the voice channel.

volume.name: volume
volume.description: Adjusts the volume of the bot on a scale from 1-100

filters.name: filters
filters.description: Shows you a list of filters you can add to the music playing.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Adds specified filter to the music playing.

pay.name: pay
pay.description: Pays targeted user a specified amount of coins.

balance.name: balance
balance.description: Shows your current coin balance in the server

removebal.name: removebal
removebal.description: (Admin) Removes specified balance form targeted user.

invitelink.name: invitelink
invitelink.description: Creates a server invite link for you.

myinvites.name: myinvites
myinvites.description: Shows the amount of people who have used your invites

suggest.name: suggest
suggest.description: Adds a formatted suggestion in the server's configured suggestion channel (requires configuration)

approve.name: approve
approve.description: (Admin) Allows you to approve a suggestion and send it to the approved suggestion channel (requires configuration)

delete.name: delete
delete.description: (Admin) Deletes a suggestion by suggestion ID

verify.name: verify
verify.description: Allows a user to verify to recieve the base member role (Requires base member role config and verification config).

ticket.name: ticket
ticket.description: Creates a ticket in the server's tickets category (requires configuration)

add.name: add
add.description: (Admin) Adds a targeted user to the ticket. By default only admin roles will have access.

upvote.name: upvote
upvote.description: Adds reactions to previous message to allow for up or down voting

level.name: level
level.description: Shows your current level in the server

startgiveaway.name: startgiveaway
startgiveaway.description: (Admin) Starts a giveaway in targeted channel

deletedata.name: deletedata
deletedata.description: Your data is deleted from our database as soon as the bot leaves your guild, however, if you want to delete your data at anytime just use this command.

developers.name: developers
developers.description: Gives information on the developers of this bot

adminhelp.name: adminhelp
adminhelp.description: Shows a list of Admin commands

userhelp.name: userhelp
userhelp.description: Shows a list of user commands

musichelp.name: musichelp
musichelp.description: Shows a list of music commands

invitebot.name: invitebot
invitebot.description: Sends you an invite link for our bot.
